description:
Do you have a lot of things to do but no time to do them? Are all that things important or you can prioritize?

Do not wait more time. You can do more with less.

This course is going to boost your productivity. I will talk about 20 practical tips that will increase your productivity if you follow them.

We will se the flow you have to follow, how to avoid distractions and procrastination, how to be more organized, and up to 20 more tips.

The course has 3 sections:

  • Introduction: focusing on the habits.
  • Personal scope: to-do lists, inbox, 2 minutes rule, Pomodoro technique, pencil and paper, health and minimalism.
  • Tech scope: zero inbox, tasks, calendar, Evernote, clean computer.
  • Working scope: keyboard shortcuts, passwords, keyboard speed, meetings, interruptions.
title: Top 20 tips to hack your productivity
